title: radon.onecorp.eu Migration
content:
We are migrating radon.onecorp.eu to another system. Please expect short interruptions between 18:00 and 22:00 (GMT+2).

We will update this incident once more information becomes available.

2021-09-28T20:05:00.000Z
Delayed

Migration is taking longer than expected. We currently have no ETA. Subscriptions are still being migrated and are unreachable for about 5 minutes each during switchover.

2021-09-28T22:35:00.000Z
Migration Paused

We will pause migration for now. Subscriptions not yet migrated will be transferred in the morning.
